entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is confused about their current location.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is being infuriating to Harry.

relationships.description: Harry glared at Dumbledore due to his infuriating behavior.
Harry asked Dumbledore about the Deathly Hallows, which made Dumbledore look worried.
Dumbledore looked worried when Harry mentioned the Deathly Hallows.
Dumbledore asked Harry for forgiveness, implying that he had done something wrong.
